forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 28. West wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 22, with temperatures rising to around 29 overnight. Southwest wind 6 to 13 mph.

weather_report:
This morning, Boston awakens under a canopy of mostly clear skies, tinged with the soft colors of dawn. The air is crisp, with the promise of a sunny day unfolding before the city. Temperatures will climb, reaching a pleasant warmth by midday, a welcome contrast to the chill of the morning. As the sun ascends in the sky, it will cast lively shadows over the streets, while a gentle west wind whispers through the trees, adding a rhythmic undertone to the urban soundscape. While a few clouds linger at the edges, they only add character to the brilliant day ahead.

As the evening draws near, the atmosphere will shift, giving way to mostly cloudy skies, with temperatures gently rising overnight. For those venturing out today, a light jacket will suffice, allowing for ease and comfort as you traverse the vibrant neighborhoods. The day beckons for simple pleasures; perhaps a stroll along the Esplanade, where the delightful mix of people and nature serves as a reminder of life’s small joys, or perhaps a visit to one of Boston’s many quaint cafés, where you can savor a warm drink while the world bustles around you. Keep your spirits high and embrace the beauty of the day.
